mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.login_name AS "loginName", a.login_time AS "loginTime", a.logout_time AS "logoutTime", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.upadte_date AS "upadteDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.online_hours AS "onlineHours", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_user_online_log( id, login_name, login_time, logout_time, create_by, create_date, update_by, upadte_date, remarks, online_hours, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{loginName}, #{loginTime}, #{logoutTime}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{upadteDate}, #{remarks}, #{onlineHours}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_user_online_log SET login_name = #{loginName}, login_time = #{loginTime}, logout_time = #{logoutTime}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, upadte_date = #{upadteDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, online_hours = #{onlineHours} WHERE id = #{id}
